Sentencas: CeO2/BaCeO3 based electrolytes, one kind of the most promising electrolytes for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells, usually suffer from poor sinterability and poor electrical performance caused by high sintering temperatures.
Titulo: Enhanced sinterability and electrical performance of Sm2O3 doped CeO2/BaCeO3 electrolytes for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells through Bi2O3 co-doping

Sentencas: In this work, Sm2O3 doped CeO2/BaCeO3 electrolytes with Bi2O3 co-doping (90 wt% Ce0.8Sm0.1Bi0.1O2,delta-10 wt% Ce0.8Sm0.1Bi0.1O3,delta, Bi-SDC-BCS) are developed, while Sm2O3 doped CeO2/BaCeO3 electrolytes without Bi2O3 co-doping (90 wt% Ce0.8Sm0.2O2,delta-10 wt% BaCe0.8Sm0.2O3,delta, BCS-SDC) are taken as a comparison.
Titulo: Enhanced sinterability and electrical performance of Sm2O3 doped CeO2/BaCeO3 electrolytes for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells through Bi2O3 co-doping

Sentencas: The electrolyte-supported cells with 75 wt% Ag-25
Titulo: Enhanced sinterability and electrical performance of Sm2O3 doped CeO2/BaCeO3 electrolytes for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells through Bi2O3 co-doping

Sentencas: wt% Ce0.8Gd0.2O1.9 as electrodes are assembled and characterized.
Titulo: Enhanced sinterability and electrical performance of Sm2O3 doped CeO2/BaCeO3 electrolytes for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells through Bi2O3 co-doping

Sentencas: The results show that the Bi2O3 co-doping allows the sintering temperature to decrease from 1300 degrees C to 1100 degrees C, showing a significantly enhanced sinterability.
Titulo: Enhanced sinterability and electrical performance of Sm2O3 doped CeO2/BaCeO3 electrolytes for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells through Bi2O3 co-doping

Sentencas: The Bi-SDC-BCS electrolyte sintered at 1100 degrees C shows a high electrical conductivity (6.08 x 10(-2)
Titulo: Enhanced sinterability and electrical performance of Sm2O3 doped CeO2/BaCeO3 electrolytes for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells through Bi2O3 co-doping

Sentencas: S cm(-1) at 700 degrees C in wet air) and a longterm stability, superior to that for most existing electrolytes with the similar chemical constitution.
Titulo: Enhanced sinterability and electrical performance of Sm2O3 doped CeO2/BaCeO3 electrolytes for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells through Bi2O3 co-doping

Sentencas: The Bi-SDC-BCS electrolyte-supported single cell shows a peak power density of 352 mW cm(-2) at 700 degrees C using humidified hydrogen as fuel and ambient air as oxidant, almost double of that for the BCS-SDC supported cells.
Titulo: Enhanced sinterability and electrical performance of Sm2O3 doped CeO2/BaCeO3 electrolytes for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells through Bi2O3 co-doping

Sentencas: Therefore, the Bi2O3 co-doping into CeO2/BaCeO3 based electrolytes provides a promising way for the development of high performance intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Enhanced sinterability and electrical performance of Sm2O3 doped CeO2/BaCeO3 electrolytes for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells through Bi2O3 co-doping
